results.definition: without anybody else or anything else
examples: the pillar stood alone, supporting nothing

results.definition: without any others being included or involved
examples: the burden of proof rests on the prosecution alone
he was alone when we met him
she is alone much of the time

results.definition: exclusive of anyone or anything else

examples: he is alone in the field of microbiology
this theory is altogether alone in its penetration of the problem
could be alone in a crowded room
